expressions.cn: 网络连接 / 信号 (wǎngluò liánjiē / xìnhào)
数字化转型 / 实现数字化 (shùzìhuà zhuǎnxíng / shíxiàn shùzìhuà)
在线交易 / 付款 (zàixiàn jiāoyì / fùkuǎn)
expressions.bm_formal: Urusan dalam talian / Pembayaran dalam talian

expressions.cn: 技术支持 / 协助 (jìshù zhīchí / xiézhù)
系统错误 / 故障 (xìtǒng cuòwù / gùzhàng)

work.scenario: Your manager asks for an update on the project's progress and mentions a new digital initiative. You also need a stable internet connection for the upcoming video conference.
key_phrases: Kita perlu memastikan **sambungan internet** stabil untuk mesyuarat.

life.scenario: You're trying to pay your utilities bill online, but your internet connection is very slow. You consider calling customer service for technical assistance.
key_phrases: Saya nak **bayar online** bil elektrik tapi **line internet** saya slow sangat.

tech.scenario: You're a developer troubleshooting a system error that occurred after a recent software update. The client wants to ensure the new digitized process runs smoothly.
key_phrases: Kita perlu pastikan sistem yang telah **didigitalkan** ini berfungsi tanpa masalah.
Saya dah hubungi **sokongan teknikal** untuk bantuan.
